Description:
Start Living Your Dream
Elegantly designed with contemporary aesthetic, this generous near new double storey four bedroom family home in Belmond on Clyde provides modern, quality and convenient life with easy access to all necessary amenities and peaceful surroundings. Flooded with natural light and offering stylish and modern finishes throughout, this great property would impress anyone who inspect it. Conveniently located short distance to Clyde shopping centre , primary and secondary schools, parks , walking tracks , childcare centres and future Westfield Shopping Centre and Clyde train station.
With immaculate presentation this masterpiece features
Four bedrooms upstairs and the study downstairs with doors which can be used as a fifth bedroom
Master bedroom with walk in robe and full ensuite with double vanity, Caesarstone benchtop and large shower
Remote controlled double lock up garage with internal access
Modern kitchen features Caesarstone island benchtop, 900mm oven and cooker, dishwasher, clear glass splashback and walk-in-pantry
Zoned ducted heating, Evaporative cooling for upstairs and split system air conditioner downstairs
Three separate living areas
LED downlights throughout and much much more!!
Built by Eight Homes , this is a rare opportunity to own your dream home in Belmond estate . Be quick to enquire not to miss this golden opportunity.
ONLY one thing left to do...

Description:
Presented Immaculately in a Perfect Location!
This impeccably presented home presents its finest finishes, custom designed by the astute owner. The property provides pure luxury everywhere you turn. After setting foot in this home buyer's expectations will be taken to the next level.
Set on a 511m2 block, offering four superbly appointed bedrooms, multiple living zones, an open plan study, all weather entertaining area, this property is designed to impress. The master bedroom equipped with premium quality carpet, walk in robe, ensuite with double vanities, stone bench tops, shower and premium lighting. The gourmet kitchen at the heart of the home featuring a stone bench tops, quality appliances, excellent amount of cupboard and bench space with a deluxe walk in pantry.
Step out to the huge undercover entertaining area with fire place and extensive block-out blinds offering relaxation in any season where you can sit back and relax.
Other features include:
- Double Remote Control Garage
- 4 Bedrooms plus Study
- Evaporate Cooling
- Gas Ducted Heating
- Fireplace
- Glass Splashback
- Ceiling fans
- Landscaped front and rear yard
With a stunning street appeal, this practical and stylish home will cater to your every need.

Description:
Feel at home in Clyde
This 1 year old quality built home is a must see for 1st home buyers, downsizers and investors alike. Features include:
- 3 Bedrooms inc Master with ensuite & WIR, 3rd BR with adjoining bathroom & WIR
- 2 Separate living areas & study nook
- Entertainers kitchen with stone benches, walk in pantry & quality appliances
- Alfresco area & 2 car garage
Extra comforts include ducted heating, split system cooling & quality flooring. With Shopping, Parks, Schools, Public transport & an abundance of cafes & restaurants close by the location is fantastic!

Description:
DOUBLE STOREY DESIGNER HOME
CLYDE, The Hartleigh Estate: In this prestigious locality is this awe inspiring, double storey, mansion of a house which would make an owner's heart swell with pride! Comprising 4 spacious bedrooms and nice big living area, it offers space and privacy for each member of the family, whilst making entertaining a breeze!
On the ground floor of this gorgeous property you are welcomed by a formal lounge/ study, a state-of-the-art kitchen laced with the best quality appliances, ample cabinetry and walk in pantry. Further up there is a massive living area. There is also a powder room for the convenience of the family and visitors.
Upstairs there is another study nook, followed up 4 very spacious rooms. The master allows a spectacular view out the windows and has its own ensuite and WIRs. The other bedrooms share a central bath.
Main Features of the Property:
- Double Storey
- 4 Bedrooms
- Master with Ensuite & WIR
- Spacious Living areas
- 2 Study Nooks
- Powder Room
- Ultra-Modern Kitchen with WIP
- Manicured Front & Back Gardens
- Alfresco
- Double Car Garage with remote
- Heating: Yes
- Cooling: Yes (Air Con)
- Down Lights: Yes
Chattels: All fittings and fixtures as inspected
Deposit terms: 10% of the purchase price
Preferred Settlement: 30/45/60 days
Location wise, this house has countless amenities well within reach by either walking or a short drive
Pasadena Shopping Centre
Cascades on Clyde Shopping Centre
Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre
Cranbourne Primary School
Cranbourne Secondary School
Cranbourne Grammar School
Chisholm TAFE
Royal Botanic Gardens
Golf Clubs
Casey RACE
This is sure to sell soon so don't miss your chance to make this dream home yours! Call Hardeep to book an inspection.
PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN HOMES
Every care has been taking to verify the accuracy of the details in this advertisement, however we cannot guarantee its correctness. Prospective purchasers are required to take such action as is necessary to satisfy themselves of any pertinent matter.

Description:
Supreme Land Banking Opportunity!
(1P3439) Located South of the current 'Clyde South PSP' UGB zone border on the opposite side of the road is this spectacular 125 acre approx. parcel of land, offering great opportunities for land banking!
The house on the property is currently leased out at $390pw week offering $20,280pa return. There is also a phone tower on the property that as of the end of 2018 was earning $34,723pa, going up each year with CPI.
Total combined income from this property is at least $55,003pa, not to mention the large return that can be added to this figure if you are to run cattle on the property.
The property has two main road frontages on both Manks Road (approx. 458m) and South Gippsland Hwy (approx. 630m). The west side is approx. 893m long and the East is approx. 1.3km long.
For all enquiries please call Jason Brown Direct.

Description:
$10,000 FHOG available for Eligible Buyers
Century 21 Casey proudly presents this beautiful Metricon home built with minor variations and with extras to suite the requirements of the owner. The whole house has very high ceilings which provide for extra storage in all the built in robes and the walk in robe in the main bedroom that has an en-suite.
The kitchen has a stone benchtop, gas stove, splashback & range hood, deep sinks and also a large pantry. The kitchen is open plan which includes living area that has glass doors to the back yard. There is a separate bathroom with shower and bath, laundry and toilet. There is ducted heating throughout the house. The huge garage accommodates 3 cars it has a double roller door as well as a roller door through to the back yard. The garage also has an internal door direct into the house. Also including 5.5 kw solar panels and newly installed dishwasher.
This property is situated in a new estate and is an easy walk to two parks and a local bus stop. There are plans for a new school to be built within walking distance. In the pipeline is proposal to reopen the railway line to Clyde with the old station a short distance away. Just a short drive away are two shopping centres, St Peters School and the extensive Casey Fields Sporting Complex.
You don't want to miss this beautiful opportunity so please call Vipin Khatri 0452 510 707 to book and appointment.
Photo ID is a must.

Description:
Near new upgraded family Home in Belmond!!
Located in the fast growing Belmond Estate, this house provides convenient family lifestyle surrounded with range of parks, recreation centres, shopping centres, access to public transport and schools.
With immaculate presentation, spacious interiors and an array of upgraded fixtures and fittings throughout, this sophisticated family home is bound to impress anyone who inspects it. With modern facade, this homes' light and bright interior comprises a front master bedroom with walk in robe and ensuite with double vanity, three spacious bedrooms with built in robes serviced with a main bathroom, an open plan living/dining finished with well appointed kitchen with 40mm stone bench tops, 900mm stainless steel five burner cooktop & oven, double under mount sink, dishwasher and a spacious pantry, a large rumpus/ theater room at the back of home. Step outside to fabulous covered and decked alfresco with designer landscaped backyard ideal for all season BBQ
Your new home comes with
- 2740mm High Ceilings
- 2340mm premium doors
- LED Down-lights to Hallway, kitchen, master bedroom, rumpus and alfresco
- Elegant floor boards to hallway, living,dining and kitchen
- Quality carpets to bedrooms and rumpus
- 900mm five burner cook top and oven to kitchen
- Spacious pantry
- Dishwasher
- 40mm Stone bench top with breakfast bar in kitchen
- Stone Benchtops in Ensite & Bathroom
- Designer Front yard and backyard landscaping
- Double garage with internal access to house
- Well designed Alfresco
- NBN fast internet Ready
Your new home is in walking distance to
- Clyde Primary School
- Parks
- Bus stop (796 Cranbourne Station - Clyde)
and short drive to
- Clyde Shopping centre (Coles, Restaurants, pharmacy, McDonalds, KMart Tyre, Coles Express)
- St Peters Secondary College
- St Thomas the apostle primary school
- Kids on Clyde child care centre
- Selandra Rise Shopping center (Woolworths, Jets Gym, Medical Center, AMCAL pharmacy, restaurants)
- Wilandra Rise primary school
- Cranbourne East Primary School
- Cranbourne East Secondary School
- Cranbourne Town Center
- Cranbourne Railway Station
- Berwick town center
- Monash Freeway (Inbound and outbound)
- Hunt Club
- KingSwim aquatic center
- Casey Fields
- Casey Grammar School
- Cranbourne Library
- Marnebek School
- St Catherine's Catholic Primary School
- St Francis Xavier College
- Hillcrest Christian College
- Rivercrest Christian College
Call Ravi on 0444 522 762 to schedule a private inspection for you to flow through the house at your own phase with no distractions and feel all this home has to offer.

Description:
Prime Position, wetlands frontage!
Sitting on 512m2 (approx.) overlooking wetlands, located in the fast growing Belmond Estate, this high-quality single story 4-bedroom dwelling is definitely not to be missed, boasting;
- 4 spacious bedrooms with BIR and master bedroom with ensuite and WIR
- 3 Spacious living areas including family, kids play room and Theatre room
- Designer kitchen with walk in pantry, stone bench tops, and stainless steel appliances
- Large outdoor undercover alfresco/BBQ entertaining area
Other features include, double garage with internal access, gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling throughout, study nook and timber floorboards throughout. Close to popular schools, public transport, shops and parks.
Get in quick, don't miss out on this remarkable home!

Description:
Modern Family LIving FIVE big bedrooms!!!!
All the hard work is done, ready to move in and start living.
Featuring a spacious open layout and 5 generous bedrooms, this immaculately kept family home is uniquely designed for comfortable living!
First home buyers and large families alike will adore this neat and tidy home located within easy reach of local amenities and right across the road from a recreational park.
Step inside and enjoy high ceilings throughout the expansive open plan living and meals area, all overlooked by a stunning kitchen with a 900mm oven and cooktop, an abundance of stone bench space, ample cabinetry and a huge walk-in pantry.
There are built-in wardrobes to each large bedroom, while the master enjoys a walk-in wardrobe and stylish ensuite with dual vanities. A chic central bathroom and separate laundry service the main living areas, with ducted gas heating and split system cooling ensuring comfortable temperatures all year round.
Outdoor entertaining is always a treat in the covered alfresco area, offering the perfect spot for the BBQ and leading out to a courtyard and grassed backyard for the kids to play on.
This block includes a secure double garage with rear access to the backyard. Theres a charming recreational park right across the street where you can enjoy the fresh air.
Youre surrounded by local schools, child minding services, shopping, parks, reserves, sports facilities and more. Quick access to arterial roads makes short work of commuting.
This is one well-appointed family home you wont want to miss, so call Don Peters on 0490 048 894 to arrange your inspection today!
Features
- Open Plan Living/Meals/Kitchen
- 5 bedrooms : Master With WIR & Ensuite
- Central Bathroom
- Gas Heating & Split System Air
- Covered Outdoor area
- Close to all amenities
- Stone benches throughout
- Block out curtains all round
- High ceilings in the open plan areas
- Walk in pantry
Upside Contact-Free Policy
In adherence to current restrictions, Upside Realty has implemented procedures for all buyer inspections, as follows:
- Latex gloves and hand sanitisers will be provided for all inspection attendees including the agent
- Social distancing guidelines must be adhered to, including no handshaking
- All contracts issued are paperless

Description:
Ultra Modern Family Home
This recently built 4 bedroom double storey is situated in much sought after Eliston Estate, offering life style facilities like parks, schools, childcare centre and future Westfield Shopping Centre and Clyde train station on a short distance from the house.
Entering the home you will be amazed by the beautiful flooring which lead all the way to kitchen, dining and living areas, powder room, enormous size chefs quarters offering plenty of bench space and storage, 900mm appliances, dishwasher and Caesar stone bench tops,
Beautiful master bedroom is upstairs with walk in robe and full ensuite, other 3 bedrooms are generous in size and include built in robes with mirror sliding doors and share a common bathroom and separate toilet, Rumpus room for kids to enjoy or to be used as home theatre,
Stepping outside the main domain there is under- roof entertainment area and overlooking the backyard for you to design the way you want.
Abundance of sunlight throughout the property all day through, double glazed windows downstairs, down-lights, exposed aggregate driveway, colorbond roof, storage under stairs.

Description:
Exquisite family home in Edgebrook estate!!
Edgebrook is carefully designed by reputed developer stockland to meet family lifestyle, livability and convenience,
with walking tracks, dog parks and picturesque Clyde Creek running through middle of the estate and surrounded with all necessary amnesties, edgebrook is the place to call home.
Come home to 4 spacious bedrooms, master with walk in robe and luxurious en-suite with his & hers vanities. Three more spacious bedroom with generous wardrobe spaces to keep the rest of the family satisfied. Cook up a storm with your fully equipped designer kitchen with adjoining open-plan dining & living area, additional separate theatre and a Leisure room.
If you're a first home buyer, you may be eligible for the $10,000 FHOG and stamp duty savings
Other features include
- European 900mm Stainless steel appliances
- Caesar-Stone grand island bench (with breakfast bar)
- Large walk-in / Butlers pantry
- Ducted heating
- Stone Benchtops in Kitchen, Ensite & Bathroom
- Pendent lights in Kitche
- 900mm Five burner Cook top
- 900mm Oven
- Front landscaping
- Remote control panel lift garage
- Fully fenced
- Downlights allthroughout
- Elegant floating boards to hallway, living, meals, kitchen
- Quality Carpets to Bedrooms
- Well designed Alfresco
Your new home is located in east access to
- Bus stops (route 897 Clyde - Lynbrook station),
- Waterfronts
- Future shopping centre
- Future railway station
- Wilandra Rise primary school
- Selandra Rise shopping centre (Woolworths, Jets Gym, Restaurants, Medical centre)
- Clyde Shopping Centre (Coles, restaurants, McDolands, Shell, KMart, Medical centre)
- Casey fields
- St Thomas the apostle primary school
- St Peters Secondary
- Cranbourne Town Centre
- Cranbourne East Primary and secondary school.
If you're a first home buyer, you may be eligible for the $10,000 FHOG and stamp duty savings
Call Ravi on 0444 522 762 to schedule a private inspection for you to flow through the house at your own phase with no distractions and feel all this home has to offer.

Description:
Welcome Home! Private inspections only. If you'd like to book an appointment, please call or email today. Please note: No appointment, No entry.
When you have the opportunity to step inside a home and know this is the one for you, you house hunting will stop as soon as you arrive at 22 Hillwood Street Clyde!
With every upgrade and options already thought of, the perfect layout for all family members, you will know you are home.
As you step inside you are greeted by a wide hallway and high ceilings giving you that luxurious feel. Conveniently tucked away and kept private at the front of the home is the master bedroom. The master bedroom is fit with a walk in wardrobe and huge ensuite. Fitted with gorgeous stone top benches, lots of bench space, cupboards, twin vanity and a double shower.
The heart of the home is perfectly positioned next to the large open plan dining and living area. The whole space is filled with natural light through the large double glazed windows.
The kitchen not only visually pleasing to the eye with waterfall benchtops and lovely pendants but has all the bells and whistles you could ever want. Huge walk in pantry (dishwasher included), accompanied by an abundance of storage and bench space with quality appliances is everything needed for the chef of the family to be able to create and prepare! A special feature is an instant hot water tap.
The remaining bedrooms are tucked away of the hallway perfectly positioned with the second living area/ kids retreat making it the perfect space for the kids to play.
The luxury continues outdoors, making it an ideal place to entertain. You can spend the chilly winter months by the cosy outdoor firepit or take advantage of the warmer months, enjoying the comfort of your alfresco, cooking up a storm on the BBQ while watching your favourite sports team with family and friends, fitted with natural gas, water point and TV point.
Heating and cooling is completely covered with evaporative cooling, ducted heating and black ceiling fans throughout. The double glazed windows also ensure the summer's heat and winters cold do not seep through.
Some extra features include: Built in Cabinetry to the main lounge area with NBN Data point, ducted vacuum, censor lights in the hallway, LED downlights, solar hot water, grey water and tinted front windows.
Situated in the prestigious Belmond on Clyde Estate, adjacent to the Million dollar Hilltop Park, within short walking distance to bus Stops, Casey Fields, Casey Ra

Description:
EDGEBROOK CALLING !!!
Edgebrook is where community spirit will thrive. It is set on a beautiful natural landscape with stunning Clyde creek running through the centre, offering a tranquil environment.
Close to shops, medical centre and recreational facilities, with Schools located within a very close proximity and public transport only minutes away, offering central park with playgrounds and BBQ facilities, Schools such as Clyde Primary, Casey Grammar, Cranbourne Primary provide various options for parents wishing quality education for their kids. Overall this community offers creek front walking paths for relaxing lifestyle options.
Thinking of building your first home or looking to upgrade, this corner block may be perfect opportunity for you. Call us today to discuss it further.
Goldbank Team welcomes you and looks forward to hearing from you.
NOTE: link for Due Diligence Checklist:
http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist
Insights: 27 Merribrook Boulevard, Clyde VIC 3978 was last sold in 2020.

Description:
NO PROGRESS PAYMENTS! TOP LOCATION!
Located in the prestigious leafy suburb of Clyde, perfectly positioned between both a thriving city and stunning parklands, Parkview on Clyde offers the perfect combination of community and location.
With Melbourne's vibrant city just 48.1kms away, and Shopping on Clyde down the road, residents have plenty of options when it comes to shopping and dining out. A reliable bus and purposed future train network all within walking distance, making travelling to and from the estate a breeze.
This welcoming community offers a wide range of amenities and activities to enjoy, whilst being close to all the local conveniences you need to continue to live an active and low maintenance lifestyle.
A uniquely planned community, this terrific estate will cater to your every need!
Now is the time to take advantage of these quality townhouses which are ideal to live in or for investment.
The amazing benefits of these townhouses are as follows:
• Directly opposite Clyde Primary School
• Within walking distance to the Proposed Clyde Town Centre and Clyde Train Station
• No progress payments
• No Plans for Body Corporate
• Fantastic Rental Income of $370 to $390 per week
• Maximum saving on stamp duty (conditions apply)
• Full advantage of tax depreciation
• Brand new property with upgraded inclusions
• Receive an additional $10,000 Government grant if you are a 1St home buyer
No progress payments!
This is a huge attraction and means up until completion, there will be no loan payments or any loss of money. For example, if you were to build a brand new house and land package with another builder, you will be paying progress payments and would be charged interest during the entire building stage. With Parkview On Clyde, this is not the case. All that is required is a 10% deposit once finance has been approved and the balance of money is only due once your townhouse is completed.
Once completed a tenant will be organised to move in.
For more information visit: www.parkviewonclyde.com.au
